devSettings.title: Spicy Lyrics - Developer Settings
devSettings.clearCurrentAllCaches: Clear Lyrics for the current song from all caches

devSettings.clearCurrentInternal: Clear Current Song Lyrics from internal state

general.title: Spicy Lyrics
general.staticBackgroundType: Static Background Type (Only works when Static Background is Enabled)
general.minimalLyricsMode: Minimal Lyrics Mode (Only in Fullscreen/Cinema View)
general.oldStyleFont: Old Style Font (Gets Overriden by the previous option)
general.hideNPVBg: Hide Now Playing View Dynamic Background
general.lockMediaBox: Lock the MediaBox size while in Forced Compact Mode
general.settingsOnTop: Display the settings panels on top of the settings page?
general.saveAndReload: Save your current settings and reload.

notifications.lyricsCacheRemovalFailed: The Lyrics cache, couldn't be removed
